clinical_history: Pelvic pain with suspected ovarian pathology.
technique: High-resolution linear and curvilinear probes used for detailed evaluation.
findings: Common bile duct measures 8.72 mm, within normal limits.
Breast tissue shows mildly thickened lesion measuring 8.32 mm.
Major vessels show mildly heterogeneous waveform on Doppler.
Uterus appears enlarged; endometrial thickness measures 13.93 mm.
